nodes.text: Ord Yndar was a planet in the Mid Rim that served as an Ordnance/Regional Depot for the Galactic Republic. During the Pius Dea Era, Ord Yndar lay at the border between Republic and Hutt Space, and the planet was used as a staging point for an assault on the Hutts when Supreme Chancellor Contispex I—a member of the religious cult Pius Dea—launched the First Pius Dea Crusade in 11,965 BBY.
Ord Yndar first appeared on a map of the Pius Dea Crusades in the 2012 reference book The Essential Guide to Warfare, as one of the planets involved in the First Crusade.
